name: Kawaljeet Kumar
body:
## About
I am a 3rd year student of the department of Electronics and Electrical Communication Engineering, IIT Kharagpur enrolled in its B-Tech Course. I am a hobbyist.

## Projects

### Autonomous Ground Vehicle
Our ultimate Aim is to make a self drive car. We are taking part in Intelligent Ground Vehicle Competition, Michigan from last 3 years. I have been working and researching on electronic and controls aspects of vehicle. 

### Home Automation
In this project, I had to make a wireless light switch and fan speed control system.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
